transcript.text: well Shalom this is daniel john lee with
tour restoration ministries the website
is wwwspa- aam and it is now day two of
the feast of Sukkot or the Feast of
Tabernacles I hope you're all having a
very wonderful feast I wanted to share
some personal things today I was reading
in Psalm 91 this morning as I was in my
sukkah and some scriptures that just
jumped out at me in that song which is
all about you know Yahweh protecting us
and hiding us under the shadow of his
wing and I just felt like when I was in
my sukkah that he was just shadowing me
in the feathers of his wings I love how
the Torah brings out these spiritual
concepts into the physical world it just
there's nothing like it it's very
Hebraic you know there was a time in my
life even after I knew who Yahshua was
and was even starting to learn about the
Torah where you know I started looking
for other things to satisfy me trying to
find my satisfaction and other things
and then Yahweh through his loving
kindness drew me back
he's good in that way I always talk
about how Yahweh speaks to these
prophetic pictures and today as I was
hiking this morning I was going along
this path and you know I had to stay on
this certain path or else i would get
into the poison oak Joshua talks about
staying on that narrow and straight path
that's very important to do or you might
get into some spiritual poison oak and
that can be very dangerous Yahweh truly
is the Living Waters fact Yahshua talked
about being the wellspring of living
waters and we'll talk about that when we
get to the eighth day because that's
directly tied to the eighth day of this
feast there was a song that Yahweh gave
me a few years ago in fact it was back
in late two thousand six I want to share
it with you guys today and I pray that
it blesses you I think it's a perfect
song for Tabernacles springtime in
summer springtime in fall springtime in
winter it's springtime all year long
thank you O Yahshua for taking my
heart's throne and thank you O Yahshua
for giving me new life thank you O
Yahshua for placing the promised land
within me thank you O Yahshua for this
eternal spring springtime in summer
springtime and fall springtime in winter
it's springtime all year long thank you
o Yahshua for taking my heart's throne
and thank you O Yahshua for giving me
new
life thank you Oh Yahshua for placing
the promised land within me thank you Oh
Yahshua for this eternal spring may this
piece of Sukkot you want a revival in
your heart may you draw close to Yahshua
the king of kings and the center of
Sukkot yah bless and Shalom
